name: PhotoImpact 3 Album
summary: An AB3 file is an image album created by version 3 of Ulead PhotoImpact. It contains references to the images included in the album, but does not contain the images themselves. When you open an AB3 file in PhotoImpact, the program uses the references and other information the AB3 file contains to load and organize the album's images.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
